snippet.title: HOPETOWN – Official Kickstarter Video
snippet.description:
It’s time—our Kickstarter is live!

A story-rich isometric CRPG where your words shape the world. Hopetown features deep, branching conversations, sharply written characters, and a world that reacts in unpredictable ways.

Watch the full video to meet the team and see our vision.

Inspired by classics like Planescape: Torment & Disco Elysium, Hopetown puts you in the role of a former journalist investigating a town above, the world below, and the depths of your own psyche—with the voices in your head as your guide.

🔥 Back us on Kickstarter today and be an early supporter! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/longduegames/hopetown
👉 www.longduegames.com
🔔 Like & subscribe for updates!

🔍 Follow the journey:

► X: (https://x.com/longduegames)
► Instagram: (https://www.instagram.com/longduegames)
► LinkedIn: (https://www.linkedin.com/company/longdue) 
#Hopetown #Kickstarter #RPG #PsychologicalRPG #IndieGame #DiscoElysium #StoryDrivenGames #Crowdfunding
